400mcg S/L misoprostol are options that can be offered to the client.
• Ask her to return for a check-up if bleeding has not settled completely by 2 weeks or if
she develops increasing pelvic pain or fever.
• Alternatively, an MVA can be done if the patient prefers this.
• In pregnancy 14 weeks or more (second trimester):
o Later in the pregnancy, chances are better that complete spontaneous expulsion of the products of
